data.actual_result: Anyone except you and the people you can see in the Member List show up as offline
data.expected_result: Everyone shows up with the correct status
data.short_description: Members in the recently spoken list while attempting to mention show up as offline despite being online (has to be a big server, and the member cannot be within view in the member list)
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a big server- Choose someone online you can't see on the Members List (to the right), including above and below view. You cannot have an open DM channel with this user)- Restart Discord- Have this user speak- Type "@"- Observe the Mentions List that appears and the user's presence bubble in this list- Click on this user's name in chat
